author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Magellan Aerospace Signs Long Term Agreement To Supply Complex Castings And Engine Shafts
text:
Magellan Aerospace Corp:
* MAGELLAN AEROSPACE SIGNS LONG TERM AGREEMENT TO SUPPLY COMPLEX CASTINGS AND ENGINE SHAFTS
* MAGELLAN AEROSPACE CORP - NEW AGREEMENT IS EXPECTED TO GENERATE ABOUT C$53 MILLION IN REVENUE FOR MAGELLAN THROUGH 2023
* MAGELLAN AEROSPACE CORP - SIGNING OF A 5-YEAR AGREEMENT WITH AN UNDISCLOSED COMMERCIAL AEROENGINE CUSTOMER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
